reviews.text:
The ice creams are generally light in flavour, very refreshing, and not towards the creamier end. The chrysanthemum flavour is very unique and a must-try if it's available.

The waffle with 2 scopes of ice creams is on the costlier side, but it's certainly one of the better tasting and well-made waffles around. When coupled with the ice creams and maple syrup, it is fantastic.

The mix & match dessert bowl with aiyu jelly and taro balls is also very good.

Found the waffles is nicer compared to last visit.

Yogurt ice-cream is so yummy n not so sweet.

Lychee Jasmine tea is refreshing drink.

Quiet place for spending time within the neighbourhood.
Enjoyed the ice cream. Not too sweet. Good cosy place to have desserts.
The ice cream are not too sweet and the flavors are unique. Nice dessert place in the neighborhood! üëç

Limited 3 table sitting with 3-4 chairs each. Luckily went there when there were seats.

Ordered the üßá with their ice cream which costs around $9+. Not the cheapest but definitely one of the better tasting ones. It was also super crunchy and hot as it was made on the spot. Must try their waffle!

Their Earl grey milk tea had the taste of the tea but not the strongest tasting one. Price wise was OK ~$3.

Their staff didn't chase us away and we sat there for a whole afternoon which was great! A good place to chill in the neighbourhood
